Detailed Description

A AppendProvider provides a view over all registered Provider. This requires that all child provider have the same structure. Therefore the UIB provides a special Provider interface. The AppendProvider puts a new index over all rows. Data modifications and read of data happens in the child provider, the AppendProvider knows the child-provider and can determine the mapped row in the child-provider.
